name: A Changed World
description:
A Changed World is a game set in a Post-Apocalyptic Future in which you, the player, are the only surviving human and you must solve a mixed bag of puzzles and platforms. Throughout this adventure, you will find yourself going from one genre to another, taking on the idea of the Jam theme "An End is A New Beginning".

Controls:

Puzzle:

WASD = Movement

Esc = Pause

 

Platformer:

W/Space = Jump

A = Left

D = Right

Esc = Pause
